title: Symmetry Gaming Recruitment (High Silver/Gold/Plat+) - Open League
body:
We are currently recruiting members for our new team Symmetry Gaming in preperation for the Open League tournaments.

Due to the short amount of time before the tournaments begin, we would like to begin training and strategic preperation immediately, and will only be accepting committed team members that are able to meet the following requirements.

We are based in Melbourne, and generally we play during 10:00pm-3:00am EST every night (this can change but we hope everyone can be online during these times).

We want to focus on progression and development, both as individuals and as a team, and would like to stick with the same roster as much as possible throughout the Open League season. We are competitive players with a drive to win, but also to learn from our mistakes, and discuss what steps could have been changed in order to secure a victory.

It would be nice to have team mates that are committed to playing together even once the Open League tournament season finishes, into the Ranked 5 Team season next year, however our primary focus for now is indeed the Open League tournaments.

Both myself and the co-owner are 20+ years old and are relatively mature, and would like to find team members that are also relatively mature but can stil handle the odd bad joke and take a defeat on the chin. We would prefer applicants to be at least 18 years old, but exceptions can be made provided you are happy to play with a bunch of old codgers.

We are currently looking for the following roles:

Top Lane Main
Jungle Main
Mid Lane Main

Fill Substitute 1
Fill Substitute 2

Our current roster:

ADC - Bolskies (Gold 4)
Support - Drew Carry (Gold 5)

Once we fill the main roster of 5, we will commence practise rounds as a team and will work on filling the substitute roles as a secondary priority.

Please ensure you are able to at least attend 3 nights of practise this coming week, as well as the first leg of the open tournament on this coming saturday (6/12/14) before registering your interest.

Please reply below with the answers to the following questions if you would like to join Symmetry Gaming. Please note that we will only be accepting applications from high silver upward.


Summoner Name:
Age:
Chosen Role:
Main Champion Pool:
Current Rank:
Rank Season 3 (If applicable):
Voice/Headset: Yes/No
Able to play during required hours: Yes/No
+ Any further information you think is applicable.

replies.body:
Summoner Name: BM Angie
Age: 15 turning 16. Age doesn't matter so I don't mind surrounded by old men. I'm quite mature.
Chosen Role: Top / Mid but I don't mind any role (except for Jungle, I make many mistakes on that.)
Main Champion Pool: Kayle, Syndra, Teemo, Ahri, Orianna, Jax, Fizz, Akali, Kat
Current Rank: Silver V
Rank Season 3 (If applicable): unranked
Voice/Headset: I have voice and headset.
Able to play during required hours: Only on Fridays and Saturdays, since I have school on others and I need at least 5hours of sleep.

**Summoner Name:** "El Teemo"
**Age:** 19
**Chosen Role:** Top main 2nd Mid and I can play all the rest decently (Not great but not bad)
**Main Champion Pool:**
**Top Lane** Tanks: Mundo, Shyvanna, Maokai, Bruisers: Wu, Yorick, Lee Sin, Jax Others: Fizz, Akali, Panth, Teemo
**Mid Lane** Yas, Kat, Veigar, Fizz, Akali, LB
**Current Rank:** Silver 3, I play better than my rank shows
**Rank Season 3 (If applicable):** unranked
**Voice/Headset: ****Yes**/~~No~~
**Able to play during required hours: Yes**/~~No~~

Summoner Name: Wolves
Age: 20
Chosen Role: Any was playing top for the last team but all rounder
Main Champion Pool: Can not really say but maokai and warwick i guess lucian as well
Current Rank: Gold 4
Rank Season 3 (If applicable): Silver somewhere long time ago
Voice/Headset: Yes
Able to play during required hours: Yes but im situated in nz so I am guessing it would be midnight to 5 am
+ Any further information you think is applicable.

Have played in 3 ranked teams aiming for pro's only one ever competitive play and that was a University tournament made it to semi's xD not a good shotcaller however good team mate and good at following orders like a good little soilder.

Summoner Name: Supremekiller
Age: 13 (I know I am young although I believe I'm mature for my age)
Chosen Role: I main mid, although I used to be a jungle main.
Main Champion Pool: In the mid lane I would usually look to go Fizz straight away but if I am unable to go Fizz I would go Zed, Katarina then Ahri in this order.
My Champion pool in the jungle would be Kha Zix, Amumu and then Fiddlesticks although I would probably choose judging by team comp etc.
Current Rank: Bronze 5 (I do however feel I have the skill level of a high-silver - low-gold, you could test me on this if you felt like it)
Voice/Headset: I have a headset
Able to play during required hours: I don't know if I would be able to play within these times exactly but I would be able to play a few hours before
The reason I am in bronze is just because I rushed my provisionals when I wasn't ready but I think I would be ready now, I have just had trouble getting out of bronze at the moment.

Summoner Name: Intero
Age: 17
Chosen Role: AD
Main Champion Pool: Lucian, Corki, Jinx, Graves, Vayne, Ezreal (Play everything
Current Rank: Plat 4
Rank Season 3 (If applicable): Plat 1
Voice/Headset: Yes
Able to play during required hours: Yes

Been on teams for the past year or so, want to join a team where people are looking to improve together and are motivated to play.
Have lots of experience and wish to learn while sharing my knowledge. 
Add me ingame for a chat :)

Summoner Name: CC Authentic
Age: 15 turning 16 however I am very mature.
Chosen Role: Best to worst : Mid (Main) > ADC > Jungle > Support > Top
Main Champion Pool: Syndra, Orianna , Zed and Yasuo
Current Rank: S4 , However S1 when season ended, Please do not judge by my rank, I am more then the cover ;)
Rank Season 3 (If applicable): Silver 4
Voice/Headset: Yes/No : YES
Able to play during required hours: Yes/No : Yes Sure. more then happy to.
+ Any further information you think is applicable.

A bit of information about me. 
I am from Korea, and I love playing League competitively. 
I am passionate , diligent and confident that I am capable and eligible to join this team.
I am determined to learn and get better from this opportunity. 

Thank you for letting me apply.

Regards,
MJ , CC Authentic

Summoner name: Boss0fTimTam
Age: 17 (18 in jan)
Chosen role: mid 
main champ pool: all mid laners (i choose to counter)
Current rank: P5
Rank season 3: G5
voice/headset: yes
Able to play during require hours: yes

Summoner name: BossOfTimTam
age: 18
chosen role: top
champ pool: all top laners picked to counter or with synergy
current rank: p5
rank season 3: g3
voice/headset: yes
able to play during required hours: yes


Additional comments:
We both are very flexible atm for 4 months until uni starts again. Currently looking for a competitive team for open ladders and coming across this thread we think this is the best opportunity. We are semi famous in the community as we play comps and events every week streamed live etc.

Age: 17
Chosen role: Middle lane 
Main champion pool: Zed, Azir, Oriana, Fizz, Lucian (Middle lane), Xerath
Current rank: Silver II 
Rank season 3: Bronze V 
Voice/headset: Yes
Able to play during required hours: Yes
Additional comments: 
Through my near 500 ranked games with zed this season, I've learnt that LoL is more than just a game of mechanics, indeed teamwork and coordination play a more vital role, and although these are hard to find in solo queue, I'd like to improve my own abilities in these areas thorough playing in a team so that hopefully I can apply these skills to my solo queue games at a later date.
